ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmmm, bellow would be good, I always forget about Bellow. Whether PoW is better for 1 mob depends on how much AC is added I suppose, I don t know. ... I am
ygData.messageBody:
> mobs seem to take less damage than from Bellow even when we
> are fighting one
> at a time. With multiple mobs Psalm is awesome.

Hmmm, bellow would be good, I always forget about Bellow. Whether PoW is
better for 1 mob depends on how much AC is added I suppose, I don't know.

> At what point do mobs start attacking more often?

I am thinking like monks and monk-skellies in the Lake of Ill Omen, I am
sure there are lots of hasted and/or double attack mobs can't think of at
the moment.


> Is Largo's safe in Dalnir's? I was hesitant to use it given the three
> levels in Dalnir's. Has anyone else had this song causing
> mobs to teleport
> to them or cast on them from different levels?

I thought Z-axis was fixed, I know I had no problem with AE in Highpass
keep.

> Kit
> "Remember I'm 50% serious, 50% devil's advocate. It's just my
> nature."

Noooo problem at all, I think it is a good discussion to have publicly, it's
a real bard issue. And besides, I COUNT on discussions like this to weed out
my misconceptions, I get a lot of things wrong, and spouting off on this
list will often get me a speedy correction :o)

Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
